name: atlanta
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital and largest city of the southeastern US state of Georgia: The headquarters are in Atlanta. Atlanta is quite different from the rest of Georgia.
More examplesFewer examplesShe broke her left foot which kept her from running in the Atlanta Olympics.The people of Atlanta have made it so enjoyable.
